successes.title: Shadows of Brimstone
successes.description: Shadows of Brimstone is a fast-paced, Cooperative, dungeon-crawl boardgame set in the Old West, and mixed with Unspeakable Horror!

Pledges.description: Cowpoke - Thanks for helping support the project!  Every bit helps.

Rustler - Here to take a gander and support the project?  At this level, you'll get a beautiful 8" x 10" Art Print signed by the Flying Frog Team and our gratitude for helping make this project a reality!
Hombre - You'll receive a handsome Shadows of Brimstone Art Book filled with concept art and illustrations from top artists in the industry and the 8" x 10" Art Print signed by the Flying Frog Team.
At this level and higher you also gain access to the Optional Add-Ons Menu!

Prospector - Choose ONE of the two Shadows of Brimstone Core Box Sets!  Plus, the Shadows of Brimstone Art Book, the 8" x 10" Art Print signed by the Flying Frog Team, and access to the Optional Add-Ons Menu!

OUTLAW Level (Early) - You get BOTH of the Shadows of Brimstone Core Box Sets, as well as the KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE Outlaw Hero Class with Miniature!  You'll also receive the Shadows of Brimstone Art Book, the 8" x 10" Art Print signed by the Flying Frog Team, and access to the Optional Add-Ons Menu!
At the OUTLAW Level and higher, you also get all unlocked Stretch Goal Rewards (marked with the Outlaw Icon)!

OUTLAW Level - You get BOTH of the Shadows of Brimstone Core Box Sets, as well as the KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE Outlaw Hero Class with Miniature! You'll also receive the Shadows of Brimstone Art Book, the 8" x 10" Art Print signed by the Flying Frog Team, and access to the Optional Add-Ons Menu! At the OUTLAW Level and higher, you also get all unlocked Stretch Goal Rewards (marked with the Outlaw Icon)!

DELUXE OUTLAW - You get BOTH of the Shadows of Brimstone Core Box Sets, as well as the KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE Outlaw Hero Class with Miniature! You'll also receive AN EXTRA SET OF ALL HERO AND ENEMY FIGURES FROM BOTH CORE BOX SETS, plus the Shadows of Brimstone Art Book, the 8" x 10" Art Print signed by the Flying Frog Team, and access to the Optional Add-Ons Menu! At the OUTLAW Level and higher, you also get all unlocked Stretch Goal Rewards (marked with the Outlaw Icon)!

ART COLLECTOR (OUTLAW) - You get the OUTLAW LEVEL plus  an ORIGINAL PIECE OF CONCEPT ART from Shadows of Brimstone! This is not a print or reproduction, this is an actual concept sketch from the game development (8.5"x11") autographed by Character Concept Artist Brian Snoddy. As a bonus, we will include an original Shadows of Brimstone "Goliath Encounter" promo postcard autographed by UK artist Ralph Horsely!

MAP MAKER (OUTLAW) LEVEL - You get the OUTLAW LEVEL plus a location on the Shadows of Brimstone Map will be named after you (for example "Bob Smith" could show up on the map as "Smith's Gulch" or "Smith Valley"), and you'll get a poster-sized art print of the Shadows of Brimstone Map autographed by the Map Artist and the Creators of the game.   You will also get your name in the game credits as a "Kickstarter Content Contributor".

MINE CART LEVEL (Round 1) - This is the Level if you want to get everything there is for the game, including all of the Stretch Goal Rewards and virtually all of the Unique Add-Ons as they Unlock!  You get the DELUXE OUTLAW Level plus all Optional Add-Ons Menu Items marked with the Mine Cart Icon for the ENTIRE DURATION of the Kickstarter Campaign!

MINE CART LEVEL (Round 2) - This is the Level if you want to get everything there is for the game, including all of the Stretch Goal Rewards and virtually all of the Unique Add-Ons as they Unlock!  You get the DELUXE OUTLAW Level plus all Optional Add-Ons Menu Items marked with the Mine Cart Icon for the ENTIRE DURATION of the Kickstarter Campaign!

MINE CART LEVEL (Round 3) - This is the Level if you want to get everything there is for the game, including all of the Stretch Goal Rewards and virtually all of the Unique Add-Ons as they Unlock!  You get the DELUXE OUTLAW Level plus all Optional Add-Ons Menu Items marked with the Mine Cart Icon for the ENTIRE DURATION of the Kickstarter Campaign!

MINE CART LEVEL (Round 4) - This is the Level if you want to get everything there is for the game, including all of the Stretch Goal Rewards and virtually all of the Unique Add-Ons as they Unlock! You get the DELUXE OUTLAW Level plus all Optional Add-Ons Menu Items marked with the Mine Cart Icon for the ENTIRE DURATION of the Kickstarter Campaign!

MINE CART LEVEL (Round 5) - This is the Level if you want to get everything there is for the game, including all of the Stretch Goal Rewards and virtually all of the Unique Add-Ons as they Unlock! You get the DELUXE OUTLAW Level plus all Optional Add-Ons Menu Items marked with the Mine Cart Icon for the ENTIRE DURATION of the Kickstarter Campaign!

MINE CART LEVEL (Round 6) - This is the Level if you want to get everything there is for the game, including all of the Stretch Goal Rewards and virtually all of the Unique Add-Ons as they Unlock! You get the DELUXE OUTLAW Level plus all Optional Add-Ons Menu Items marked with the Mine Cart Icon for the ENTIRE DURATION of the Kickstarter Campaign!

MINE CART LEVEL (Round 7) - This is the Level if you want to get everything there is for the game, including all of the Stretch Goal Rewards and virtually all of the Unique Add-Ons as they Unlock! You get the DELUXE OUTLAW Level plus all Optional Add-Ons Menu Items marked with the Mine Cart Icon for the ENTIRE DURATION of the Kickstarter Campaign!

MINE CART LEVEL (Round 8) - This is the Level if you want to get everything there is for the game, including all of the Stretch Goal Rewards and virtually all of the Unique Add-Ons as they Unlock! You get the DELUXE OUTLAW Level plus all Optional Add-Ons Menu Items marked with the Mine Cart Icon for the ENTIRE DURATION of the Kickstarter Campaign!
SPECIAL NOTE
All Mine Carts of Round 5 and Higher include a Bonus Credit for Add-Ons:

MineCart (Round 5) =   + $25 Credit
MineCart (Round 6) =   + $50 Credit
MineCart (Round 7+) = + $75 Credit

Gen Con Lunch - You get the DELUXE OUTLAW Level plus you and a friend will have lunch with game creators, Jason and Scott at Gen Con 2014!  (NOTE: Does not include travel to Indianapolis or admission to GenCon).
RETAILER PACKAGE - For Licensed Game Retailers only!  You get 6 copies of each of the two Core Box Sets (12 Total games) as well as 6 copies of the Kickstarter Exclusive Outlaw Hero Class Character.

MAP MAKER (MINE CART) LEVEL - You get the MINE CART LEVEL plus a location on the Shadows of Brimstone Map will be named after you (for example "Bob Smith" could show up on the map as "Smith's Gulch" or "Smith Valley"), and you'll get a poster-sized art print of the Shadows of Brimstone Map autographed by the Map Artist and the Creators of the game.   You will also get your name in the game credits as a "Kickstarter Content Contributor".

ART COLLECTOR (MINE CART) - You get the MINE CART LEVEL plus an ORIGINAL PIECE OF CONCEPT ART from Shadows of Brimstone! This is not a print or reproduction, this is an actual concept sketch from the game development (8.5"x11") autographed by Character Concept Artist Brian Snoddy. As a bonus, we will include an original Shadows of Brimstone "Goliath Encounter" promo postcard autographed by UK artist Ralph Horsely!
